Guardian Shield-Bearer

Creature - Human Soldier

Megamorph 3G (You may cast this card face-down as a 2/2 creature for 3. Turn it face up at any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

When Guardian Shield-Bearer is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.
